name: Shoulder and Arms
description: Training shoulders and biceps together can be an effective way to structure your workouts, especially because some bicep exercises involve parts of the shoulder and vice versa.

name: Belly And Body
description: The Belly Gym offers cutting-edge and well maintained fitness equipment & facilities. I will help you enjoy burning away those extra calories. Burning calories from your belly  will make you looks better.

name: Back and Thigh
description: The back and thigh exercise is very important and effective for the body because those parts are directly connected to our backbone . So , our body structure should be strong enough to carry our weight.
